content: Beyond that, the other thing that I would read from the broader moves we're making and you can see this, if anyone who observes, broadly the personnel changes that we've made over the last year, I will continue to make this should become apparent is that, we really believe that, whereas the health care and benefits industries tend to be slower adopters of technology, that we are starting to see very -- in relative terms, rapid adoption of things like, API driven workflows and the like, that really play to our advantage as a partnering organization versus a closed garden organization, kind of a walled garden, nothing wrong with walled gardens, as we've discussed in the past, but that's not our ship.
